title: Can't send  Yahoo Mail
content: Can't send Yahoo Mail. Was working fine until this afternoon. Getting error: Login to server smpt.mail.yahoo.com with username xxxx@yahoo.com failed. Using Thunderbird 115.11.1 (32-bit). Can someone help? Thanks!
creator: illroute66

title: I have never had a problem with thunderbird and have both imap and pop3 emails.
creator: slisk

title: Thunderbird Error Message
content:
I have been using Thunderbird for many years. In Thunderbird I found this message: "Login to server inbound att.net (username) failed." When I tried to send an email I got this message: "Sending of the message failed: Unable to authenticate the Outgoing Server (SMTP) outbound att.net. Please check the password and verify the "Authentication method" in "Account Settings." [outgoing server (SMTP)]

I went to att.net and I am still receiving emails. In fact, I received an email from Mozilla Support that allowed me to sign into Mozilla Support.

Please help so I can send outgoing emails from Thunderbird.

Thank you
creator: drawohna

title: Sending mail directly to specific sub-folders
content: I have several sub-folders connected to my "Inbox". How do I have specific incoming mail sent directly to the different sub-folders? I had no problem doing this prior to Thunderbird 115.1 taking over my previous edition. Tried following the instructions under Settings but it wasn't very helpful.
creator: mpale8311
